name: Checklist Genie
tagline: Create sharable checklists with just your voice & AI
description: The smart, simple way to create and share lists — in seconds. Use your voice or a photo to instantly build actionable checklists powered by AI. Track daily, weekly, and monthly routines with ease.

name: MyLens Stock Market
tagline: AI for Stock & Market Analysis
description: Ask our AI about any stock, company, sector, market & more. It scans trusted sources, analyzes data, and summarizes everything into an easy-to-understand visual Board with price trends, sentiment, SWOT, and other key signals. Simple, fast, and reliable.

name: Inbox Zero Tabs
tagline: Split inbox tabs for Gmail. 100% private. 100% free
description: Get 100+ emails daily? Gmail labels show EVERYTHING - current emails mixed with archived stuff. Impossible to batch process. Inbox Zero Tabs adds custom tabs showing only unarchived emails for efficient batching.

name: LLM SEO EEAT
tagline: Free SEO check for Google's E-E-A-T content guidelines
description: Get instant E-E-A-T scores and AI-powered recommendations to improve your content's trustworthiness and search rankings.

name: Abode
tagline: Fresh take on group spaces with friends.
description: Abode is the best place to hang out on your phone. Multiplayer widgets in a space where you and your friends can craft your own social.

name: Bitchat
tagline: Anonymous messaging via Bluetooth mesh networks by Dorsey
description: Chat with people nearby using only Bluetooth - no WiFi, cellular, or internet needed. Messages relay through connected devices up to 300m away. End-to-end encrypted with no accounts or tracking. Built for gatherings, disasters, protests, etc.

name: VentureStaking® by Doriot®
tagline: Own the right to invest in the next breakout startup
description: VentureStaking lets anyone lock in future investing rights in ambitious, talented, and prepared entrepreneurs — only committing real capital once traction is proven.

name: Buildstash
tagline: A new home for your software binaries
description: A new accessible approach to build artifact and release management for software teams. For mobile and desktop apps, games, XR, or embedded - never lose a build again, distribute to testers, steer through QA and sign-off, and manage your rollouts.

name: Virly
tagline: Viral LinkedIn posts in your voice
description: Virly writes viral LinkedIn posts in your voice to attract new customers for your product and delivers a 30-day content plan with scheduled daily posts.

name: 3D Bust Maker
tagline: Make a 3D Bust from a single photo, ready for 3D printing
description: Turn a single photo into a 3D-printable bust in minutes. Upload one image, and our AI generates a detailed, print-ready 3D file. No scans or multi-angle shots needed. Perfect for gifts, keepsakes, and custom 3D projects.

name: InfographsAI: AI Designs Beyond Template
tagline: AI-powered Canva alternative for infographics,charts,Mindmap
description: InfographsAI: Transforms any text into professional infographics, mind mapsCharts, Logos in 200 seconds. No design skills needed. No Manual design, dynamic templates, real-time charts100 languages. Perfect for content creators, marketers & businesses.

name: Discursa
tagline: Every question deserves more than one mind.
description: DISCURSA orchestrates leading AI models into intelligent conversations, delivering perspectives and insights no single AI can provide.

name: Cognigauge
tagline: The universal dashboard for your brain.
description: Cognigauge offers a 10 minute baseline test, giving a "Brain Score" & AI-driven insights on diverse domains relating to your cognitive function. Through gamified daily cognitive tests and passive biomarkers, we track & improve cognitive function over time.

name: OCRMD
tagline: Convert images & pdfs to editable Markdown & LaTeX
description: Convert images to editable text with our free, client-side OCR tool. Upgrade to Premium for full document scanning with AI-enhanced recognition delivering 90-99% accuracy, plus Markdown and LaTeX extraction.

name: WisFile
tagline: 100% Local & Free AI File Manager for Docx and PDFs
description: WisFile is a local, free AI file tool for professionals, researchers, and students to auto-rename, categorize, and organize documents like papers or projects, turning chaos into clarity securely.

name: MEMEFA.ST
tagline: Make meme videos right in your browser, for free
description: MEMEFA.ST is a simple & fast meme video editor, 100% powered by the web. Quickly create and export video memes for your creator channels, or just have fun with friends!

name: MyRupaya
tagline: World's First Movie Ticket Discount Finder
description: We have built world's first movie ticket discount finder, basis your credit card brand name. Card details are not rquired to use this feature. Now you can find discount on PayTm, PVR, Inox, District and BookMyShow from one place.

name: DreamAI
tagline: Decode your dreams, unlock your mind.
description: DreamAI helps you interpret your dreams with AI-powered insights. Simply describe your dream and get meaningful interpretations, themes, and patterns — all in a beautiful, intuitive interface.

name: SuitdiO
tagline: AI workspace for problem-solving
description: SuitdiO is an AI-powered workspace that accelerates problem-solving from data collection to strategic planning. Work familiarly in Note, Boards, and Table (coming soon), and use AI directly on your work. Oh, and you can insert various files including web

name: Hiring Agent
tagline: Offload the hiring
description: 🚀 Hiring Agent automates hiring: 1️⃣ Enter role, get JD in a click 3️⃣ Prompt shortlisting: filter what you need 4️⃣ 🤖 AI Voice Agent schedules interviews 5️⃣ 📝 Track, analyze, & summarize feedback Built for startups to hire smarter!
